Package edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify

The simplification package for ideal2 (mathematical) arithmetic.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AffineExpression
    Represents an expression of the form aX+b, where X is a "pseudo primitive polynomial", and a and b are concrete numbers.
    AffineFactory  
    BoundMap
    A BoundMap keeps track of bounds on all Monic expressions occurring within a given simplification context.
    IdealSimplifier
    An implementation of Simplifier for the "ideal" numeric factory IdealFactory.
    IdealSimplifierFactory  
    LinearSolver
    Simplifies a constant map.
    SimplifierInfo
    An object that gathers together a variety of objects as fields needed to perform simplification.

Package edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify Description

The simplification package for ideal2 (mathematical) arithmetic. Using monomials as the canonical form.
